scripts.development: yarn run favicon && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js
scripts.watch: yarn run favicon && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --watch --progress --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js
scripts.production: yarn run favicon && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --no-progress --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js
scripts.favicon: [ -e public/favicon.ico ] && echo Favicons exist already. || app-ico -c storage/app/img/.app-ico.js
